section.37: Chapters on the description of the Day of Judgement, Ar-Riqaq, and Al-Wara'

hadiths.text: Abu Maisarah narrated from 'Aishah that they had slaughtered a sheep, so the Prophet (s.a.w) said:"What remains of it?" She said: "Nothing remains of it except its shoulder." He said: "All of it remains except its shoulder
